summary: REQ-37 is implemented on the Programs & Impact page by changing the Economic Empowerment program's `locations` field to `India, Jharkhand` in `frontend/src/pages/ProgramsImpactPage.tsx`. However, based on the provided diff summary, there is not enough evidence that the previous locations text is removed everywhere else on the site or that all other displays of the Economic Empowerment locations were updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply the Economic Empowerment location change anywhere the site currently displays the programâ€™s locations, and ensure the old text "Cambodia, Myanmar, Bolivia, Nicaragua" is no longer displayed anywhere on the site.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows the location update in `ProgramsImpactPage.tsx`. No other UI locations (e.g., homepage featured programs preview or any other components/pages that might also display program locations) are shown as updated, so site-wide removal of the old text cannot be confirmed from this diff summary.
evidence: file-diff indicates only 3 modified files total, with no other program/location display code changes shown

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained repository metadata/documentation files unrelated to REQ-37 (frontend file summary and project state/versioning).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-37 only requests changing the displayed location text for a specific program; updating `frontend-file-summaries.txt` and `project_state.json` is not requested as part of that requirement.
